meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jessica Rebel Matt Kish Diana Peloquin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6794.

td.p: Jessica Rebel, a contract attorney and stay-at-home mom from Lenexa, Kansas
Matt Kish, a high school history teacher from Brunswick, Ohio
Diana Peloquin, a graduate student of law and social work from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,700)

tr.td: TV CHARACTER ALIASES
FAMILIAR PHRASES
AUTOMAKERS
FORD
DETROIT ROCKS!

tr.td: He impersonated Mr. Burns, but when asked for Mr. Burns' first name, he replied, "I don't know"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Matt] We had to go to Asia, and that\'s what he did, starting with [*] in Europe and [**], the capital of North Korea.)
DianaWhat Santiago and Quito?
$5,697
JessicaWhat are Santiago and Bogota?
$11,598
MattWhat are Moscow + Pyongyang Pyongyang
$10,201
Moscow & Pyongyang')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
